name: Google Vault
description: Google Vault is the eDiscovery and compliance solution for G Suite, allowing customers to retain, hold, search, and export their data

key_json.description: Contents of Service Account JSON file

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
List all open, closed, and deleted matters

state.description: Defines which type of matters has to be retrieved

limit.description: Maximum number of matters to return

actions.description: Creates a matter with OPEN state of matter
Fetches information for the given matter_id
actions.verbose: There are two views of a matter: BASIC (default) and FULL. The FULL view adds matter permissions to the BASIC view.

actions.description: Close a matter and state of matter changes to CLOSED
Delete a matter and state of matter changes to DELETED
Reopens a matter and state of matter changes to OPEN
Undeletes a matter and state of matter changes to CLOSED
List all holds for given matter id

limit.description: Maximum number of holds to return

actions.verbose: For search method ACCOUNT you have to provide valid list of user emails and search method ORG_UNIT you have to provide valid org_unit_id. Data scope UNPROCESSED_DATA is not supported for corpus type DRIVE.

corpus.description: Choose where to apply your hold

search_method.description: Defines search method that for whom you will be doing search

user_email_ids.description: Comma separated list of user's email id

terms.description: Conditions must be met for a message to be covered by this hold

start_time.description: Comma separated list of user's email id

end_time.description: Comma separated list of user's email id

include_shared_drive_files.description: Comma separated list of user's email id

actions.description: Removes held account from given hold ID

example_values: Successfully removed held account to 3z8qrdt111pgr8 hold id for 209366a8-eadc-4687-8d23-190afdfb12ba matter id

actions.description: Adds held account from given hold ID

example_values: Successfully added held account to 3z8qrdt111pgr8 hold id for 209366a8-eadc-4687-8d23-190afdfb12ba matter id

actions.description: List all exports for given matter id

limit.description: Maximum number of holds to return

actions.description: Gets information of export from given matter id
Send a request to Vault that gathers messages and files that match your criteria
actions.verbose: For search method ACCOUNT you have to provide valid list of user emails and search method ORG_UNIT you have to provide valid org_unit_id. Data scope UNPROCESSED_DATA is not supported for corpus type DRIVE.

data_scope.description: Defines scope of data which to be exported (Mode)

search_method.description: Defines search method that for whom you will be doing search

user_email_ids.description: Comma separated list of user's email id
